import React from 'react' import Chip from '@material-ui/core/Chip'; import CodeRoundedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/CodeRounded'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'; import CardActionArea from '@material-ui/core/CardActionArea'; import CardMedia from '@material-ui/core/CardMedia'; import '../images/me.jpg' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ skills: { paddingTop: 160, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap', '& > *': { margin: theme.spacing(0.5), }, } })) function AboutMe(){ const classes = useStyles(); return( <>
} label="ReactJS" color="secondary" /> } label="Python" color="primary" /> } label="Javascript" color="secondary" /> } label="HTML5" color="primary" /> } label="CSS3" color="secondary" /> } label="Docker" color="primary" /> } label="C#/.NET" color="secondary" /> } label="OpenCV" color="primary" />
) } export default AboutMe
